be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits
Class Bit

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits.LogicCircuit
        |
        +--be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits.Bit
public class Bit
extends LogicCircuit

A Bit is an autonomous LogicCircuit whose boolean value is under public control. The boolean value of an instance of this type does not depend on other LogicCircuit instances.

The boolean value is initially false, and can be changed by calling flip().

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Jan Dockx
